author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Miracle Flights for Kids Continues Medical Flight Mission with Almost 500 Flights in SeptemberTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Miracle Flights for Kids Continues Medical Flight Mission with Almost 500 Flights in September  
Miracle Flights for Kids finished September with 495 life-saving flights. The nation’s leading health and welfare flight organization enables children with rare and life-threatening medical conditions to gain access to specialized, out-of-state medical care through commercial flights.”We’re thrilled to have helped so many families this past month,” said Miracle Flights Founder and National President, Ann McGee. “We know we’ve made a difference in so many lives, but we still have miles to go. We won’t rest until every child has access to the care they need.”
 
 
Miracle Flights has also been selected as one of 12 finalists in the Lightspeed Aviation Foundation’s Pilots Choice Awards Grant program. Aviation-related charities are chosen to compete in an online poll, with the winner receiving a $10,000 grant. To help more children get to the specialized, out-of-state medical care they need, vote for Miracle Flights’ kids.
